column4: no web developer who can help me to launch my PHP files in Firefox? =(. I moved my files to /var/www but can't see them. Hope somebody  can help-
erm, do you have a web server running?
are the php files set executable?
well...errr.... how can I test it?
yes, I can read them in the terminal but Firefox doesn' t want to cooperate to see them local.
thanks. I'll take a look there.
i'm not asking you whether you can see them in the terminal, i want the output of ls -l so i can see whether they're executable
ls: cannot access /var/www/file.php: No such file or directory
substitute file.php with the actual file you have :P
ok, it's not executable. do "sudo chmod a+x /var/www/index.php"
no, you need to do it to the files. you could do it recursively though. chmod -r etc
if it doesn't, try following that troubleshooting section. i'm flying to bed now, see you later
